greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of prime divisors of A339821(n), counted with multiplicity.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: (PARI) A339902(n) = { my(s=0, p=2); while(n>0, p = nextprime(1+p); if(n%2, s += bigomega(p-1)); n >>= 1); (s); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 21 2020
